tool_description:
Automatically detects handwritten or watermarked text in document images and removes it
[See the functional effects](https://rapidapi.com/macmashtu/api/automatic-removal-of-watermarks-or-handwritten-text/details)
name: Automatic removal of watermarks or handwritten text
title: Automatic removal of watermarks or handwritten text
tool_name: Automatic removal of watermarks or handwritten text

api_list.name: Automatic removal of watermarks or handwritten text
api_list.description: Support jpg, png, BMP, pdf, tiff, single frame gif, etc., image size not more than 10M
